title: TREC-COVID Search Index
description: TREC-COVID Search IndexThis notebook builds a search index over the TREC-COVID dataset. Background on how this search index works can be found in the CORD-19 Analysis with Sentence Embeddings notebook. Install environmentInstall the cord19q library and scispacy.
